physicalSystems

Class Gyrocompass

  • java.lang.Object
    • physicalSystems.Gyrocompass

  • public class Gyrocompass
extends java.lang.Object
    Emulates a theoretical Gyrocompass. Would normally read in values, in this scenario it will update its own values according to the relevant states passed in.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Eric Le Fort, Christopher McDonald

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Gyrocompass()
      Creates new GyroCompass with standardized values.
      Gyrocompass(double startDirection)
      Creates new GyroCompass with a standardized pitch and a specified direction.
      Gyrocompass(double startDirection, double startPitch)
      Creates new GyroCompass with a specified pitch and a specified direction.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getDirection()
      Returns the current value held for direction in degrees.
      double getPitch()
      Returns the current value held for pitch in degrees.
      void updateDirection(double currentAcceleration, double currentSpeed, double flapState, double timePassed)
      Takes the current direction and alters it according to the states passed in.
      void updatePitch(double flapState, double currentSpeed, double timePassed)
      Takes the current pitch and alters it according to the states passed in.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Gyrocompass

        public Gyrocompass()
        Creates new GyroCompass with standardized values.

      • Gyrocompass

        public Gyrocompass(double startDirection)
        Creates new GyroCompass with a standardized pitch and a specified direction. Direction must be within 0 to 360.
        Parameters:
        startDirection - - Starting Direction of Airplane

      • Gyrocompass

        public Gyrocompass(double startDirection,
                   double startPitch)
        Creates new GyroCompass with a specified pitch and a specified direction. Direction must be within 0 to 360(exclusive) and Pitch must be within -90 and 90.
        Parameters:
        startDirection - - degrees, starting Direction of Airplane
        startPitch - - degrees, starting Pitch of Airplane

    • Method Detail

      • updateDirection

        public void updateDirection(double currentAcceleration,
                            double currentSpeed,
                            double flapState,
                            double timePassed)
        Takes the current direction and alters it according to the states passed in.
        Parameters:
        currentAcceleration, - m/s/s
        currentSpeed - - km/h, positive
        flapState - - -90 - 90 degrees, inclusive
        timePassed - - seconds, time since last update, positive

      • updatePitch

        public void updatePitch(double flapState,
                        double currentSpeed,
                        double timePassed)
        Takes the current pitch and alters it according to the states passed in.
        Parameters:
        flapState - - -90 - 90 degrees, inclusive
        currentSpeed - - km/h, positive
        timePassed - - seconds, time since last update, positive

      • getPitch

        public double getPitch()
        Returns the current value held for pitch in degrees. 90 - full vertical climb 0 - flying level -90 - full vertical dive
        Returns:
        The current pitch.

      • getDirection

        public double getDirection()
        Returns the current value held for direction in degrees. N - 0 E - 90 S - 180 W - 270
        Returns:
        The current direction.
